mapper.update: update plan_production_collection set road_id=#{roadid},plan_no=#{planno}, recipe_id=#{recipeid},pd_need=#{pdneed},dry_mixing_time=#{drymixingtime}, wet_mixing_time=#{wetmixingtime},radio=#{radio},pd_temp=#{pdtemp}, arrive_temp=#{arrivetemp},price=#{price},datetime=#{datetime}, edit_user_id=#{edituserid},edit_datetime=#{editdatetime},delete_state=#{deletestate} where plan_id=#{planid}
update plan_production_collection set delete_state=0 where plan_id=#{planid}
update plan_production_collection set piancha_id=#{pianchaid} where plan_id=#{planid}
update plan_construction_deviation set delete_state=0 where id=#{id}

update u_user set username=#{user.username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password=#{user.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, work_id = #{user.workId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, record_no = #{user.recordNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, u_name = #{user.uName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{user.sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthday = #{user.birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nation = #{user.nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, marriage = #{user.marriage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, political_status = #{user.politicalStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, entry_time = #{user.entryTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{user.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, card_id = #{user.cardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, postal_code = #{user.postalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_no = #{user.phoneNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{user.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, diploma = #{user.diploma,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, school = #{user.school,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, specialty = #{user.specialty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, graduation_time = #{user.graduationTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, om_id = #{user.omId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, duty_id = #{user.dutyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, duty_name = #{user.dutyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, certificate = #{user.certificate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, certificate_grade=#{user.certificateGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, position=#{user.position,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where user_id = #{user.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT round(a.price*a.pd_need,2) as price,a.*,usr.u_name,sfm.fl_no,srm.road_name,srm.road_no, pcd.piancha_name,pcd.piancha_no,pniod.sumneed FROM plan_production_collection AS a LEFT JOIN u_user usr ON a.edit_user_id = usr.user_id and usr.delete_state = 1 LEFT JOIN sys_road_mgn srm on a.road_id = srm.road_id and srm.delete_state = 1 LEFT JOIN sys_formulation_management sfm on sfm.fl_id = a.recipe_id and sfm.delete_state = 1 LEFT JOIN plan_construction_deviation pcd on a.piancha_id = pcd.id and pcd.delete_state = 1 LEFT JOIN (select a.plan_id,sum(a.pd_need_inc_or_dec) sumneed from plan_production_count a GROUP BY a.plan_id) pniod on pniod.plan_id = a.plan_id WHERE a.delete_state = 1 order by a.datetime desc
SELECT a.* from plan_construction_deviation a WHERE a.delete_state = 1 order by a.datetime desc
select * from plan_construction_deviation where id=#{id} and delete_state=1

SELECT top 1a.arrive_temp as arrivetemp,b.arrive_temp_offset as arriveTempOffset,(#{temp}-a.arrive_temp) as PianCha from plan_production_collection a LEFT JOIN plan_construction_deviation b ON b.id=a.piancha_id where a.road_id=(SELECT road_id from batch_mgt where id=#{batchid}) AND a.delete_state=1 ORDER BY a.datetime DESC
